description.value: NutrientModifier : Codes for types of nutrients that are being modified such as carbohydrate or sodium. This value set includes codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 226355009 (Nutrients(substance)), and the concepts for Sodium, Potassium and Fluid. This is provided as a suggestive example.
